document.full_text: at&t  will give deutsche telekom  a break-up fee and benefits worth about $6 billion if regulators reject the proposed takeover of the german company's u.s. business, deutsche telekom said on friday.
document.title: deutsche telekom confirms at&t break-up fee worth $6 billion
lines_and_colors: at&t  will give deutsche telekom  a break-up fee and benefits worth about $6 billion if regulators reject the proposed takeover of the german company's u.s. business, deutsche telekom said on friday.
